AdvancedLowPassFilterData

Contains the data for the InertialNode::setAdvancedLowPassFilterSettings API call.

Functions
AdvancedLowPassFilterData
AdvancedLowPassFilterData() : dataDescriptor (SCALED_ACCEL_DATA), manualFilterBandwidthConfig (SET_TO_HALF_REPORTING_RATE), applyLowPassFilter (true), cutoffFrequency (0)
Types
DataDescriptor

The enum for the different data descriptors.

SCALED_ACCEL_DATA = 0x04 SCALED_GYRO_DATA = 0x05 SCALED_MAG_DATA = 0x06 SCALED_PRESSURE_DATA = 0x17

ManualFilterBandwidthConfig

The enum for the different data descriptors.

SET_TO_HALF_REPORTING_RATE = 0X00 USER_SPECIFIED_CUTOFF_FREQ = 0x01

Variables
applyLowPassFilter
bool applyLowPassFilter

applies low-pass filter if set to true.

cutoffFrequency
uint16 cutoffFrequency

Sets the cutoff frequency, only if manualFilterBandwidthConfig == USER_SPECIFIED_CUTOFF_FREQ
